Function.DocText:
Var to set : SYSTEM_NAME : use this var to set system name of the current operation system
Base usage : Get_system_tunning
Returne : Function execution

/Docker /alpine-en-3.20.0-1-tunned.log /bin /boot /dev /etc /home /init /lib /lib32 /lib64 /libx32 /lost+found /media /mnt /opt /proc /root /run /sbin /snap /sources /srv /sys /tmp /tools /usr /var autodoc.sh create_objname.sh install_base.sh readme.md script_template.sh detect_linux_distro autodoc.sh create_objname.sh install_base.sh readme.md script_template.sh @desc Determines the Linux distribution type autodoc.sh create_objname.sh install_base.sh readme.md script_template.sh @return Prints the type of Linux distribution: Debian, Ubuntu, Red Hat, or others autodoc.sh create_objname.sh install_base.sh readme.md script_template.sh autodoc.sh create_objname.sh install_base.sh readme.md script_template.sh Usage: autodoc.sh create_objname.sh install_base.sh readme.md script_template.sh detect_linux_distro **/

Set_system_counter_TO_init : use this var to init counter to 0 ${1} : use this var to set Set_system_counter_TO_init External_Return_Counter : is used to returne counter value Basic use : Set_system_counter_TO_init "[ To init ]"
